00020 #ifndef __SNAPREADHDF5_H
00021 #define __SNAPREADHDF5_H
00022 
00023 int snap_read( void ){
00024   std::vector<unsigned int> data_id;
00025   std::vector<double> data_pos;
00026 
00027   std::string filename = "/export/data1/psteger/HDF5/snapshot_030_halos.hdf5";
00028   //    HDFReadDataset( filename, "Data_IDs", data_id );
00029   //    HDFReadVector( filename, "Data_Positions", data_pos );
00030   int samplestart=0;
00031   int samplesize=100000;
00032   HDFReadDatasetSlab( filename, "Data_IDs", samplestart,samplesize,data_id );
00033   HDFReadVectorSlab( filename, "Data_Positions", samplestart,samplesize,data_pos );
00034 
00035   // output read vectors
00036   //    for(int i=0; i<data_pos.size() && i < samplesize ;++i)
00037   //        std::cout << data_pos.at(i) << std::endl;
00038 
00039   //    write info into hdf5
00040   filename="/export/data1/psteger/ClusterSimulations/matlab/myhdf5.hdf5";
00041   HDFCreateFile( filename );
00042   HDFCreateGroup( filename, "Group1" );
00043   HDFWriteDataset( filename, "Group1/Data_IDs", data_id);
00044   HDFWriteDatasetVector( filename, "Group1/Data_Positions", data_pos);
00045 
00046   //    example in-/output
00047   //    hdf5exWrite("myfile.hdf5");
00048   //    hdf5exRead("myfile.hdf5");
00049 
00050   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00051 }
00052 
00053 #endif
